meanings.definition: Relating to the study of fossils.
meanings.sent1: The paleontological exhibit displayed ancient bones.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use paleontological tools to learn about dinosaurs.
meanings.sent3: The paleontological puzzle was missing a crucial piece.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a paleontological treasure trove of old toys.
meanings.sent5: The museum guide explained the paleontological process in detail.

meanings.definition: Involving the scientific study of prehistoric life through fossils.
meanings.sent1: The paleontological research team discovered a new species.
meanings.sent2: The paleontological expedition unearthed rare artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The paleontological mystery kept the scientists intrigued.
meanings.sent4: Her bookshelf was a paleontological timeline of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent5: The documentary provided a fascinating look into paleontological discoveries.
